Nerangs.ab: ... vīspaca vohu mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide hōm ud urwarām andar hāwan abganišn xšnūman az ān ī bēd wizārdan (VrS29.4) agar xšnūman ahlawān padiš bēd guftan tā staōmi zbaiiemi ... (VrS30.13) yeŋ́hē.hātąm tā̊sca yazamaide ka ēzišn gāhānbār (VrS29.3) mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide (VrS29.4) ratauuō vīspe mazišta yazamaide aiiara asńiia māhiia yāiriia sarəδa yazamaide hāuuanīm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe raϑβəm yazamaide maiδiiōizarəmaēm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide ayāb ān gāh bēd

"At ... vīspaca vohu mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide, he has to throw hōm and urwarām into the hāwan. They should utter the corresponding šnūman (VrS29.4). If the šnūman contains the one for the ahlawān, they should recite until staōmi zbaiiemi ... (VrS30.13) yeŋ́hē.hātąm tā̊sca yazamaide. When it is a liturgy for Gāhānbār, (they should recite) (VrS29.3) mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide (VrS29.4) ratauuō vīspe mazišta yazamaide aiiara asńiia māhiia yāiriia sarəδa yazamaide hāuuanīm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe raϑβəm yazamaide maiδiiōizarəmaēm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide or the corresponding gāh."

... vīspaca vohu mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide xšnūman az ān ī bēd wizārdan (VrS29.4) ka pad xšnūman aṣ̌āunąm padiš bēd staōmi zbaiiemi (VrS30.13) yeŋ́hē.hātąm ka ēzišn gāhānbār bēd (VrS29.3) mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide (VrS29.4) ratauuō vīspe mazišta yazamaide aiiara asńiia māhiia yāiriia sarəδa yazamaide hāuuanīm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe raϑβəm yazamaide maiδiiōizarəmaēm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide ayāb ān gāh bēd.

"At ... vīspaca vohu mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide, they should utter the corresponding šnūman (VrS29.4). When it contains the one for the aṣ̌āunąm, (they should recite) staōmi zbaiiemi (VrS30.13) yeŋ́hē.hātąm When it is a liturgy for the Gāhānbār, (they should recite) (VrS29.3) mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide (VrS29.4) ratauuō vīspe mazišta yazamaide aiiara asńiia māhiia yāiriia sarəδa yazamaide hāuuanīm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe raϑβəm yazamaide maiδiiōizarəmaēm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide or the corresponding gāh."

... vīspaca vohu mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide ka gāhānbār bēd (VrS29.4) ratauuō vīspe mazišta yazamaide aiiara asńiia māhiia yāiriia sarəδa yazamaide hāuuanīm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe raϑβəm yazamaide maiδiiōizarəmaēm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide ... (VrS30.11) haδa.zaōϑrəm haδa.aiβiiā̊ŋhanəm tā ō (VrS29.3) hōm ud urwarām andar hāwan nihādan aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide (VrS29.4) ahurəm mazdąm raēuuaṇtəm xᵛarənaŋᵛhaṇtəm yazamaide aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaϑrā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide aṣ̌āunąm vaŋᵛhīš sūrā̊ spə̄ntā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō staōmi zbaiiemi …

"At ... vīspaca vohu mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide, when it is a Gāhānbār, (they should recite) (VrS29.4) ratauuō vīspe mazišta yazamaide aiiara asńiia māhiia yāiriia sarəδa yazamaide hāuuanīm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe raϑβəm yazamaide maiδiiōizarəmaēm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide ... (VrS30.11) haδa.zaōϑrəm haδa.aiβiiā̊ŋhanəm until (the end). (VrS29.3) He should put hōm and urwarām in the hāwan (and then) aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide (VrS29.4) ahurəm mazdąm raēuuaṇtəm xᵛarənaŋᵛhaṇtəm yazamaide aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaϑrā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide aṣ̌āunąm vaŋᵛhīš sūrā̊ spə̄ntā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō staōmi zbaiiemi ..."
